description.zh-cn: 中国考古学家、历史学家。
description.en: Chinese archaeologist and historian.

description.zh-cn: 清末在北京设立的翻译学堂，徐旭生曾在此学习法文。
description.en: A translation school established in Beijing during the late Qing Dynasty, where Xu Xusheng studied French.

description.zh-cn: 法国巴黎的一所大学，徐旭生曾在此留学学习哲学。
description.en: A university in Paris, France, where Xu Xusheng studied philosophy.

description.zh-cn: 位于开封的一所师范学校，徐旭生曾在此任教。
description.en: A normal school in Kaifeng where Xu Xusheng once taught.

nodes.id: 河南留学欧美预备学校

zh-cn: 河南留学欧美预备学校

description.zh-cn: 位于河南的一所学校，旨在为学生留学欧美做准备，徐旭生曾在此任教。
description.en: A school in Henan aimed at preparing students for study in Europe and America, where Xu Xusheng once taught.

description.zh-cn: 中国著名高等学府，徐旭生曾在此担任教授、教务长及哲学系主任。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher learning in China, where Xu Xusheng served as a professor, dean of studies, and head of the philosophy department.

en: Sino-Swedish Scientific Expedition to the North-Western Provinces of China

description.zh-cn: 由中国和瑞典学者组成的科学考察团，对中国西北地区进行了广泛的科学考察。徐旭生任中方团长。
description.en: A scientific expedition team composed of Chinese and Swedish scholars that conducted extensive scientific investigations in Northwest China. Xu Xusheng served as the Chinese leader.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典探险家、地理学家，中瑞西北科学考察团瑞方团长。
description.en: Swedish explorer and geographer, leader of the Swedish side of the Sino-Swedish Scientific Expedition.

zh-cn: 国立北平大学女子师范学院

description.zh-cn: 中国近代一所女子师范高等学府，徐旭生曾任院长。
description.en: A women's normal university in modern China, where Xu Xusheng served as president.

description.zh-cn: 北京师范大学的前身之一，徐旭生曾任校长。
description.en: One of the predecessors of Beijing Normal University, where Xu Xusheng served as chancellor.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的国家最高学术研究机关之一，徐旭生曾任史学研究所所长。
description.en: One of the highest national academic research institutions during the Republic of China era, where Xu Xusheng served as the director of the Institute of History.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民政府的咨询及民意机关，徐旭生曾任第二至四届参政员。
description.en: An advisory and public opinion body of the Nationalist Government of the Republic of China, where Xu Xusheng served as a member from the second to the fourth sessions.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高政权机关，徐旭生曾当选第一届国民大会代表。
description.en: The supreme organ of state power in the Republic of China, where Xu Xusheng was elected as a delegate to the First National Assembly.

nodes.id: 中国科学院考古研究所

zh-cn: 中国科学院考古研究所
en: Institute of Archaeology, Chinese Academy of Sciences

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家级考古学研究机构，徐旭生曾任一级研究员。
description.en: The national archaeological research institution of the People's Republic of China, where Xu Xusheng served as a first-class researcher.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国全国性的史学学术团体，徐旭生曾任常务理事。
description.en: A national historical academic society in the People's Republic of China, where Xu Xusheng served as a standing council member.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、历史学家，曾任中国史学会主席。
description.en: Chinese political figure and historian, who served as the chairman of the Chinese Historical Association.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、教育家，曾任中国史学会副主席。
description.en: Chinese political figure and educator, who served as the vice-chairman of the Chinese Historical Association.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史学家，曾任中国史学会副主席。
description.en: Chinese historian, who served as the vice-chairman of the Chinese Historical Association.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国发生的政治运动，对社会各方面造成了严重破坏。
description.en: A political movement in China from 1966 to 1976, which caused severe damage to all aspects of society.

description.zh-cn: 河南省南阳市唐河县在历史上的一个名称，是徐旭生的出生地。
description.en: A historical name for Tanghe County, Nanyang, Henan Province, the birthplace of Xu Xusheng.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都，徐旭生在此逝世。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China, where Xu Xusheng passed away.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育家、心理学家，曾任国立北京大学哲学系主任，为徐旭生的前任。
description.en: Chinese educator and psychologist, who served as the head of the philosophy department at National Peking University, preceding Xu Xusheng.

description.zh-cn: 中国美学家、美术史论家，曾任国立北京大学哲学系主任，为徐旭生的继任者。
description.en: Chinese aesthetician and art historian, who served as the head of the philosophy department at National Peking University, succeeding Xu Xusheng.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育家，曾任国立北平师范大学校长，为徐旭生的前任。
description.en: Chinese educator, who served as the chancellor of National Peiping Normal University, preceding Xu Xusheng.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育家，曾任国立北平师范大学校长，为徐旭生的继任者。
description.en: Chinese educator, who served as the chancellor of National Peiping Normal University, succeeding Xu Xusheng.

description.zh-cn: 1906年后，徐旭生进入京师译学馆学习法文。
description.en: After 1906, Xu Xusheng entered the Jingshi Yixue Guan (Imperial Translation College) to study French.

description.zh-cn: 1913年至1919年，徐旭生在法国巴黎大学留学学习哲学。
description.en: From 1913 to 1919, Xu Xusheng studied philosophy at the University of Paris in France.

description.zh-cn: 1919年回国后，徐旭生在开封第一师范学校任教。
description.en: After returning to China in 1919, Xu Xusheng taught at the Kaifeng No. 1 Normal School.

relationships.target: 河南留学欧美预备学校

description.zh-cn: 1919年回国后，徐旭生在河南留学欧美预备学校任教。
description.en: After returning to China in 1919, Xu Xusheng taught at the Henan Preparatory School for Study in Europe and America.

description.zh-cn: 1921年，徐旭生被聘为北京大学哲学系教授。
description.en: In 1921, Xu Xusheng was appointed as a professor in the Department of Philosophy at Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 1926年，徐旭生出任北京大学教务长。
description.en: In 1926, Xu Xusheng became the Dean of Studies at Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 1926年4月至1929年3月，徐旭生担任国立北京大学哲学系主任。
description.en: From April 1926 to March 1929, Xu Xusheng served as the Head of the Philosophy Department at National Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 1927年，徐旭生作为中瑞西北科学考察团中方团长，率团前往中国西北地区进行考察。
description.en: In 1927, as the Chinese leader of the Sino-Swedish Scientific Expedition, Xu Xusheng led the team to investigate Northwest China.

description.zh-cn: 1927年，徐旭生与瑞方团长斯文赫定共同率领中瑞西北科学考察团。
description.en: In 1927, Xu Xusheng and the Swedish leader Sven Hedin jointly led the Sino-Swedish Scientific Expedition.

description.zh-cn: 1929年，徐旭生担任国立北平大学女子师范学院院长。
description.en: In 1929, Xu Xusheng served as the President of the Women's Normal College of National Peiping University.

description.zh-cn: 1931年2月至1932年5月，徐旭生担任国立北平师范大学校长。
description.en: From February 1931 to May 1932, Xu Xusheng served as the Chancellor of National Peiping Normal University.

position.en: Director of the Institute of History

description.zh-cn: 1937年，徐旭生出任国立北平研究院史学研究所所长。
description.en: In 1937, Xu Xusheng became the Director of the Institute of History at the National Academy of Peiping.

description.zh-cn: 自1940年起，徐旭生担任第二至四届国民参政会参政员。
description.en: Starting from 1940, Xu Xusheng served as a council member for the second to the fourth sessions of the People's Political Council.

position.en: Delegate to the First National Assembly

description.zh-cn: 1947年，徐旭生当选为第一届国民大会代表。
description.en: In 1947, Xu Xusheng was elected as a delegate to the First National Assembly.

relationships.target: 中国科学院考古研究所

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，徐旭生任中国科学院考古研究所一级研究员。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, Xu Xusheng served as a first-class researcher at the Institute of Archaeology, Chinese Academy of Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 1954年，徐旭生担任中国史学会第一届理事会常务理事。
description.en: In 1954, Xu Xusheng served as a standing council member of the first council of the Chinese Historical Association.

description.zh-cn: 1957年，徐旭生加入中国共产党。
description.en: In 1957, Xu Xusheng joined the Communist Party of China.

position.en: Delegate to the Third National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 1964年，徐旭生当选为第三届全国人大代表。
description.en: In 1964, Xu Xusheng was elected as a delegate to the Third National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，徐旭生受到迫害。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Xu Xusheng was persecuted.

description.zh-cn: 1954年在中国史学会第一届理事会共事，郭沫若任主席，徐旭生任常务理事。
description.en: Worked together in 1954 on the first council of the Chinese Historical Association, where Guo Moruo was chairman and Xu Xusheng was a standing council member.

description.zh-cn: 1954年在中国史学会第一届理事会共事，吴玉章任副主席，徐旭生任常务理事。
description.en: Worked together in 1954 on the first council of the Chinese Historical Association, where Wu Yuzhang was vice-chairman and Xu Xusheng was a standing council member.

description.zh-cn: 1954年在中国史学会第一届理事会共事，范文澜任副主席，徐旭生任常务理事。
description.en: Worked together in 1954 on the first council of the Chinese Historical Association, where Fan Wenlan was vice-chairman and Xu Xusheng was a standing council member.

description.zh-cn: 徐旭生接替陈大齐担任国立北京大学哲学系主任职务。
description.en: Xu Xusheng succeeded Chen Daxi as the Head of the Philosophy Department at National Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 邓以蛰接替徐旭生担任国立北京大学哲学系主任职务。
description.en: Deng Yizhe succeeded Xu Xusheng as the Head of the Philosophy Department at National Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 徐旭生接替李石曾担任国立北平师范大学校长职务。
description.en: Xu Xusheng succeeded Li Shizeng as the Chancellor of National Peiping Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 李蒸接替徐旭生担任国立北平师范大学校长职务。
description.en: Li Zheng succeeded Xu Xusheng as the Chancellor of National Peiping Normal University.
